pullRequest.title: #18990 now the key value on the url map as a map instead of single st…
pullRequest.bodyText: Now on the page render api; the key value on the url map is being rendered as a map (json map) instead of a string

commit.message: #18990 now the key value on the url map as a map instead of single string

nodes.bodyText: I think this code should be part of a more generic Serializer - DotContentletTransformer- any content can have a key/value field, not just Pages

commit.message: #18990 refactoring to add the key value map to the DotTransformer

nodes.bodyText:
I don't think the strategy should be applied directly it must be applied from within the transformer.
Let's say you do
new DotTransformerBuilder().defaultOptions() 
the code that instructs the transformer to apply this strategy must be part of the options provided to the transformer. You should never apply a strategy outside of the transformer

commit.message: #18990 adding refactor to be align with the DotTransformer approach
